title: Riot, this is how you fix jungle
body:
Buff jungle camp experience so that ganking is a risk that can set the jungler back if they fail. This will make ganks happen less often and will bring diversity to the role with farming and ganking junglers alike being picked. The more you nerf jungle exp and gold, the more oppressive junglers will be to lane and the more camille/graves/lee sin games we are going to see next season. If I am a jungler and camps are garbage, guess what I am going to spend 90 percent of my time doing? 

Revert the scuttle changes. This was a failed experiment that forced fights early and ruined jungle diversity. It also set one jungler far back behind the other and negatively affected lanes that needed to help with these encounters. 

Increase early vision time with wards so that laners can be safer in the first few levels of the game. 

I know none of these changes will happen because this game is now something made for LCS players that the rest of us get to play. Thats why I expect season 9 to be trash can.

Before you would need someone to be low or just massively disadvantaged for a gank to result in a kill most of the time. Now, because of the tons of damage in the game you really just need a slight edge or way to get into the lane and boom. Dead laner. 

Ton down the damage in the game which almost everyone wants and jungle will inherently take a hard hit because those ganks will no longer almost always be successful ganks.

This just rewards MORE ganks due to junglers having a better EXP curve. I don't think you quite understand how to make jungle healthier as a role. If anything the role needs nerfs since it's so impactful.

What you CAN do is make camps harder to clear so then junglers have to actually work around their HP and timings again.

why not give junglers power ups which rewards "same side" jungles a incentive to still in jungle at least a little to slow their aggression towards laners so they dont oppressively gank a "certain" lane. if a gromp is on your side of jg if you kill it you get a gromp mini shield or something (you get the idea).

Problem with buffing the exp rates in the jungle is if you do an early gank and the enemy jungler does not counter jungle you to punish you now we are back to where we started but now the camps give you more exp to catch up/ level up even faster. Another issue with this is if you just power farm your camps gank and repeat you will be over leveled really quickly and again we will be back in the place we started with. If you really want "fix" the jungle i would say look in the direction of the really early seasons of the game where camps did not give that much exp and gold but they spawned quicker. Or you can nerf the items and stats of junglers but i think that this method of "fixing" the jungle is a terrible idea
